item.title: Horse Research
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Royal Mews "Built in the 1820s, the Royal Mews is one of the finest working stables in the world. It is also home to the Cleveland Bay and Windsor Grey horses which pull the coaches on ceremonial occasions; and houses the royal collection of historic carriages and coaches." Race Horses Breeds and classes of horses (Links courtesy of my lovely wife)
